message.body: The chances of it actually happening are very small.
Then the chance of you not dealing with her insanity is very large. Lucky you? how's packing going?
How's your leg and the packing going?
Not great but okay, and just down to cleaning, respectively.
Well that's a small blessing in disguise
This is the firefly thing? I don't watch firefly and I'll probably be spending the day, you know, I preparing for my new job ;-)
booooooooring. Come on, stop by for a bit. I can even drive, but then you get stuck until I go home
It really depends on how the weekend goes. I have a ton of administrative crap to handle, so it would have to be a game-time decision. When is it supposed to start?
Yeah, I almost certainly can't do that. I have to go shopping for new work clothes on Sunday (sigh)
ok well let me know if you chage your mind. I might go earlier since the marathon starts at 7am actually... obviously not going that early... prolly
